title: BMO Capital Markets Hires Wells Fargo’s Malik as Operating Chief
description: Bank of Montreal’s capital markets arm has named Aman Malik as chief operating officer, replacing Nina Knezevic in the latest leadership shuffle at the firm.
content: Bank of Montreal’s capital markets arm has named Aman Malik as chief operating officer, replacing Nina Knezevic in the latest leadership shuffle at the firm.
